div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die maij
quo Supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod thomas
philp est filius et heres propinquior quondam thome Willelmi philp burgensis
de abirdene Igitur datum fuit In mandatis thome leslie vnj ballivorum
ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terras suas ut decet filium et heredem
burgensis cognosci

Eodem die d thomas philp filius et heres quondam Willelmj
philp cum consensu et assensu Johannis lundoris consanguinei suj
Elegit dominum Duncanum Archebaldi vicarium de methtlik suum
legittimum curatum ad regendum se terras suas et bona quecumque
sibi pertinentes secundum leges et Statuta Regnj quiquidam dominus Duncanus
Inuenit dictum Johannem lundoris plegium et Caucionarium
ad respondendum dicto thome pro suis terris et bonis ac commodo et
vtilitate sua ac pro gubernacione corporis suj secundum exigenciam Juris
ut decet curatum et sua bona regi et gubernarj

Eodem die Alexander fyschear' protestatus fuit Solempniter quod
quicquid dictum actum factum seu procuratum fuerit penes conductionem
mariote Sponse sue non cedat sibi in preiudicium quin habeat
Sponsam suam sibi adherentem

Eodem die dominus Duncanus Archebaldi vicarius de methtlik ac
Curatus thome philp nouiter Electus fecit constituit et creauit
Johannem lundoris suum legittimum procuratorem ad petendum et accipiendum bona
Jure hereditario et alias sibi per decessum autem patris suj contingen' Agend'
faciend' de receptis acquitand' promitten' de Rato et grato ac Judicio sisti
cum omnibus aliis clausulis necessariis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij sui
absencia sua secundum Induran' voluntatem dicti domini Duncanj

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Williame
blinsel forspekar that marione Wat sal Remane and mak seruice
to Jonhne nicholsone vnto the tyme scho pas' til hir' avne hous'
and thar' to remane but fraud til ony part

The saide day the action' persevit be gilbert chamer menyeis agan Johne
chamer anent the wranguis' avay taking' of ane maskfat and vthir gudis
pertening to thomas menyeis of ayrschip vndir the kingis arrest or continevit
to monunday next hereftir in hoipe of Concord'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij
die mensis maij anno quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman Alexander menyeis Dauid menyeis
Alexander Rede Jonhne Cullane Jonhne Colisone and thomas prat
commissaris of with the last generale assedacion In the nayme
of the haill tone and with ane gret part of the consal and part of
the Communite resauit Elizibeth' Cullane spous' to Alexander
chamer of murchill his assignay to his half nethis fischingis
of the Raik to the vigile of SanctAndrow in winter
nixt hereftir and frathin furtht thre yeris continualie to be Runnyn
scho payand' the maile tharof and deviteis siclik as vthiris pais
for siclik takis of the quhilkis the saide Elizibeth' tuk Instrument
befor thir witnes' Androw Cullan balye Jo mastir thomas William Strathachin
Jonhne Colison mathow branche sere Robert Waus sere Johne of
Kynninmond' mastir Alexander bysset philp Dunbrek and Andrew
nachtj sergeand'

head.add: Jonhne Duncanson' and the widew of vmquhil James fraser

div.p:
The saide day Androw nachtj officiar' presentit ane Rede siluerit
tuyssay pandyt be the widew of vmquhile James fraser and douchtir
to androw Cantuly of banf to quhilk tuyssay
being presentit four lauchful mercat days obefor to the kingis mercat
and appit thar as efferis the ferde and last day It was prisit be
Suorne prisaris Dauid theman and Jonhne Waus in the greyne to the avale
of xxxvij s' et viii d'

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem Elizibeth' vocat
div.p:
Eodem die Dauid menyes Alexander Rede John Cullane Johannes Colisone Andreas
murray senior Jacobus Colisone Johannes Retre Dauid mar Willelmus Kintor
Willelmus blinsel thomas Waus Richardus Waus Willelmus andirson Jacobi
patricius chernsid' et alexander nachtj Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus alexander
vocat frater Elizibeth' vocat latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente in vico nauium
ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi gray ex orientali et terram altaris
Sancti andree apostoli ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam versus austrum extendentem
ad communionem venellam versus boriam Et quod dicta Elizibeth' est vna de
propinquioribus legittimis heredibus dicti quondam domini alexandri de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis quod valet nunc per annum xx s' et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per Spacium
In defectu heredis legittimi Jus suum minime prosequentis
Copia commissionis

head.add: Copia litterarum assedacionem de duobus Rethibus de furdis pro octo annis

div.p:
Vniuersis et singulis ad quorum Noticias presentes littere peruenerint burgenses et communitas burgi
de abirdene Eternam in domino salutem Sciatis nos matura auisiacione prehabita vti
tiliate nostra in hac parte vndequam preuisa et diligenter considerata pro conseruacione et de
fencione burgi nostri contra nostros antiquos Inimicos anglicos terrarum nostramrum nostrarum de
crowis et Rubislaw ac piscariarum de Raik pro quibus coram Serenissimo domino nostro
Rege et suis dominis consilij summonatj sumus ac organorum nostrorum reformacione
et correctione aliisque causis racionabilibus animum nostrum ad hoc monen' fecisse consti
tuisse et ordinasse necnon tenore presencium facere constituere et ordinare nostros predi
lectos conburgenses dominum Johannem Ruthirfurde militem nostrum nunc prepositum Robertum
blinsell Dauid menyhes Johannem cullan Johannem collisone Thomam prat et Johannem
Wormet nostros legittimos commissarios Irreuocabiles Tandem et conceden' eisdem ac
maiori parti eorundem nostram plenariam potestatem ac mandatum speciale totas et
Integras piscarias nostras duorum rethium de le furdis super aquam de Dee firmis
et grissumis liberas pro terminis octo annorum nostris conburgensibus et eorum prolibet asse
dand' et arrendand' plenarie complendorum Inmediate post completum Istius
nostre generalis assedacionis Instantis Et generaliter omnia alia et singula faciend'
gerend' et excercend' In premissis necessaria et oportuna promitten' Ratum gratum /
firmum et stabile haben' et habituris totum et quicquid dicti commissarij aut
ipsorum maior' pars In premissis nomine nostro Rite duxerint aut duxerit faciend'
In cuius rej testimonium presentibus nostrum sigillum communie appendj fecimus Apud dictum burgum
Octauo die mensis maij Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Septimo

Be it kend till al men be thir present lettres ws Aldirman balyeis counsall and communite
of Abirdene our avale in that part sone considerit and vndirstandin to haue sett and to for
maille lattyn' and be thir present lettres settis and to formaile lattis till Williame
gray Secund sone till our louet nichbour Alexander gray all and haill the fischingis
of ane half nettis of the furdis apone the wattir of Dee for all the termes of
aucht yeris girsome and malis fre for ane certane some vsuale money of
scotland pait till ws to the said alexander in novmerit money in tyme of the mak
ing of thir lettres to the defens' and resisting of the Inuasioun' of our auld Inemeys
of Ingland and Sayftie and conseruacion of our burgh' for the defens' of our heritage
of the landis of the crovis our' landis of Rubislaw fischingis of the Raik for
the quhilkis we stand' vndir our souerane lordis summonce for the reforming of
our organis and for vthir resonabile causis concerning vs of the quhilkis some
of formaill for the said aucht yeris we hald vs weill content and fullely
pait and dischargis and quiet'clamis the said William his airis executouris and
assignez now and foreuir for vs our successouris airis executouris and assignez now and
foreuir and for ale vthiris quhom' It efferis To be haldin and hed all and haill
the fischingis of the said half nethis with thar pertinence to the said Williame
his airis and assignez with all and sindrie fredomis asiamentis and profitis quhatsum
euir pertening or onyvis' may pertene tharto The Entra of the said William
his airis or assignez salbe in and with the said half nethis fisching' on'
the vigile of Sant Androw in wynter in the yer of god a thousand fyve
hundretht yeris quhilk salbe the vsche of this our generale assedacion Instan'
And frathin furtht to continew in peciabile Josyn' and brukin the sammyn'
quhill al the termes of aucht yeris haill and to gidder be fullely compleit and runnyn
malis fre and girsome fre but ony Impediment question' obstakill or demand
of vs or ony vthiris to be maid in the contrar and gif It happinis the said Wyl
liam his airis or assignez tilbe Inquiet Impedite or onywys' wexit in the
Enteress' Josyn' and brukyn' of the said half nethis fisching at the said term'
and Induring the said yeris as god forbed' quharthrow thai may nocht pecia
bile Joys' the sammyn fisching thane we oblis' vs and our successouris aldirman
balyeis counsale and communite refunde and pay to the said William his airis or assignes
twenty pundis vsuale money of scotland for costis skathis dampnis and expensis
maid and sustenit tharthrow within aucht dayis eftir It be knawin the Impe
diment be maid nochtwithstanding this assedacion havand ale strintht
force and effect obefor And we the said' Aldirman balyeis counsale and communite
and our successouris sale warand' kep and defend ale and hale the said half nethis
fisching with the pertinence to the said William his airis and assignez for al the
termes of aucht yeris as said Is aganis ale deidly al fraud and gyle
away put In witnesing of the quhilkis our commone Seill Is hungyne to
thir our lettres at abirdene the aucht day of may the yer' of god jM iiijc nynty
and sevyn' yeris be for thir witnes' ser Johne Ruthirfurd Aldirman alexander menyes
Robert blinsell Dauid menyes Alexander Rede Johne of Culane Johne colli
sone Thomas prat Johne Wormet burges of the said burghe and ser Johne
Streueling notar public et cetera

Be it kend till al men be thir present lettres ws Aldirman balyeis counsale and
communite of abirdene our avale in that part sene considerit and vndirstandin to haue set and to
ferme lattyn' And be thir present lettres settis and to ferme lattis to Androw crage secund
sone till our louit nichbur Robert of crag all and haill the fisching of ane half
nethis of the furdis apone the wattir of Dee for al the termes of aucht yeris
girsum and malis fre for ane certane some vsuale mone of Scotland pait till
vs be the said Robert in novmerit mone in tyme of the making of thir present lettres
to the defens' and Resisting of the Inuasion' of our auld Innemeys of Ingland
sayfyte and conseruacion' of our burghe' for the defens' of our heritage of the landis of the
crovis our landis of Rubislaw fischingis of the Raik for the quhilkis we
standis vndir our souerane lordis summonce for the reforming of our Organis and for
vthir resonabill causis concerning vs of the quhilkis some of formaill for the
said aucht yeris we hald vs weill content and fullely pait and dischargis
and quiet'clamis the said Androw his airis executouris and assignais for vs our'
successouris airis executouris and assignais now and foreuir and for all vthiris quhome
It efferis To be haldin and hade ale and haile the fischingis of the said half
nethis with thar pertinence to the said Androw his airis and assignais with ale and sindrie
fredomis commoditeis aisiamentis and profitis pertenyng or onywis' may perten'
tharto / the Entra of the said Androw his airis or assignais salbe in and with the said half
nethis fischingis on' the vigile of Sanct Androw in wynter in the yer of god
a thousand and fyve hundretht yeris quhilk salbe the vsche of this our
generale assedacione Instan' And frathinfurtht to continew in peciable'
Josyne and broukyn' the sammyn' quhill the termes of aucht yeris haill and
togiddir be fullely complet and Runnyn' malis fre and gyrsome fre but ony Impediment
questione obstakile or demavnd' of vs or ony vthiris to be maid in the contrar And
gif It happinis the said Androw his airis or assignez tilbe Inquiet Impedit or onyvis'
wexit in the Enteres' Josin and brukin of the said half nethis fisching' at the said
terme Induring the said' yeris as god forbed' / quharthrow thai may nocht pecia
bile Joys' the sammyn fisching / Thane we oblis' vs and our successouris Aldirman
balyeis Counsale and communite to content refund and pay to the said Androw his airis
or assignez twenty pundis vsuale money of scotland for costis skathis dampnis and
expensis maid maid and sustenit tharthrow within aucht dayis eftir It be knawin the
Impediment be maid Nocht withstanding this assedacione havand ale strintht force
and effect as obefor And we the said' aldirman balyeis counsale and communite and our
successouris sale warand kep and defend' ale and hale the said' half nethis fisch
ing' with the pertinence to the said Androw his airis and assignes fo for al the termes
of aucht yeris as said Is aganis ale dedly All fraude and gyle away put
In witnesingis of the quhilkis our commone Seill Is hungyne to thir our lettres at
Abirdene the aucht day of may the yer' of god ane thousand four' hundretht
nynty and sevyne yeris be for thir witnes' ser Johne Ruthirfurd aldirman
Alexander menyes Robert blinsell Dauid menyes' Alexander Reide Johne of Culane
Johne collisone Thomas prat Johne Wormet burges' of the said burghe and
ser Johne stirueling Notar Public'

Be it kend' till al men be thir present lettres ws aldirman balyeis counsale and
communite of Abirdene our avale in that part sene considerit and vndirstandyne to haue
set and to ferme lattyne and be thir present lettres settis and to ferme lattis tile
our louet nichtbur george bissat all and haill the fischingis of ane half
nethis of the furdis apone the wattir of Dee for ale the termes of aucht
yeris gyrsome and malis fre for ane certane Some vsuale money of scot
land pait tile vs be the sad george In novmerit money in tyme of the
making' of thir lettres to the defens' and resisting of the Inuasione' of our ald Inne
meys of Ingland and sayftie and conseruacione of our burghe for the defens' of our
heritage of the landis of the crovis our landis of Rubislaw fischingis of the
Raik for the quhilkis we stand vndir our souerane lordis summonce for the
reforming of our Organis and for vthir resonabile causis concerning vs Of the
quhilk some of maile for the said aucht yeris we hald ws weill content
and fullely pait And dischargis and quiet'clamis the said george his airis executouris
and assignez now and foreuir for vs our successouris airis executouris and assignez now
and forueir and for ale vthiris quhome It efferis To be haldin and hede al and haile
the fischingis of the said half nethis with thar pertinence to the said george his
airis and assignez with ale and sindrie fredomis aisiamentis and profitis pertening or ony
wis' may pertene tharto The Entra of the said george his airis or assignez sal
be in and with the said half nethis fisching on' the vigile of Sanct Androw in wynter
in the yer of god ane thousand and fyve hundretht yeris quhilk salbe the vsche
of this our generale assedacione Instan' and frathin furtht to continew in peciable'
Josin and brukin the sammyn quhile ale the termes of aucht yeris haile and to
giddir be fullely complet and Runnyn malis fre and gyrsome fre but ony Impe
diment questione Obstakile or demavnd' of vs or ony vthiris to be maid'
In the contrar' and gif It happinnis the said george his airis or assignez
tilbe Inquiet Impedite or onywis' wexit In the Enteress' Josyne and brukyn' of
the said half nethis fisching at the said terme and Induring the said' yeris as
god forbed' quharthrow thai may nocht peciably' Joys' the sammyn' fischingis
thane we oblis' vs and our successouris aldirman balyeis counsale and communite
to content refund and pay to the said georgis or airis or assignez twenty
pundis vsuale mone of scotland for Costis skathis dampnis and expensis maid
and sustenit tharthrow within aucht dayis eftir be It be knawin the Impedi
ment be maid Nochtwithstanding this assedacion' havande ale strintht force
and effect as Obefor And we the said Aldirman balyeis Counsale and communite
and our successouris sall warand kep and defend' ale and haile the said half
nethis fischingis with the pertinence to the said george his airis and assignez
for ale the termes of aucht yeris as said Is aganis ale deidly all
fraude and gyle away put In witnesing of the quhilkis Our common
Seill Is hungyne to thir our lettres at Abirdene the aucht day of may
the yer' of god a thousand four' hundreth nynty and Sevyne yeris be
for thir witnes ser Johne' Ruthirfurd Aldirman Alexander menyes Robert
blinsele Dauid menyes Alexander rede Johne of Cullane Johne collison'
Thomas prat Johne Wormet burges of the said burghe' and ser Johne
stirueling notar public et cetera

Be it kend till al men be thir present lettres vs Aldirman balyeis counsale
and communite of Abirdene Our avale in that part sene considerit and vndirstandyn'
to haf set and to ferme lattyne and be thir present lettres settis and to formaill
lattis tile our louet nichtbur' Thomas chapman ale and haile the fisch
ingis of ane half nethis of the furis furdis apone the wattir of Dee for ale
the termes of aucht yeris mailes and girssome fre for ane certane
Some vsuale mone of scotland pait tile vs be the said Thomas in
novmerit money In tyme of the making of thir present lettres to the defens'
and resisting of the Inuasione of our ald Inemeys of Ingland and sayftie and
conseruacion' of our burghe' for the defens' of our heritage of the landis
of the crovis our landis of Rubislaw fischingis of the Raik for the quhilkis
we stand' vndir our souerane lordis summonce for the reforming of our organis
and for vthiris resonable' causis concerning vs of the quhilk some of formaile for the
said aucht yeris we hald vs weill content and fullely pait and dischargis
and quiet'clamis the said Thomas his airis executouris and assignez now and foreuir
for vs our successouris airis executouris and assignez and for ale vthiris quhom' It
efferis now and foreuir To be haldin and hede ale and haile the fischingis of the
saide half nethis with thar pertinence to the said Thomas his airis and assignez
with ale and sindrie fredomis aisiamentis and profitis quhatsumeuir pertenyng or
onywis' may pertene tharto The Entra of the said Thomas his airis
or assignez salbe in and with the said half nethis fischingis on' the vigile
of Sanct Androw in wynter in the ye yer of god a thousand and fyve hundreth
yeris quhilk salbe the vsche of this our generale assedacione Instant and frathinfurtht
to continew in peciabile Josyn' and brukin the sammyn' quhill ale the termes of aucht
yeris haile and togiddir be fullely complete and runnyn' malis fre and gyrsome fre
but ony Impediment questione of demand of vs or ony vthiris to be maid in
the contrar' and gif It happinnis the said Thomas his airis or assignez to
be Inquiet Impedit or onywis' wexit In the Enteress' Josyn' and brukin of the
said half nethis fischingis at the said' terme and Induring the said yeris
as god forbed' quharthrow thai may nocht peciable' Joys' the said fischingis
Thane we oblis' vs and our successouris aldirman balyeis counsale and communite to
content refund and pay to the said Thomas his airis or assignez twenty
pundis vsuale money of scotland for costis skathis dampnis and expensis
maid and sustenit tharthrow within aucht dayis eftir It be knawin the Im
pediment be maid Nochtwithstanding this assedacion' havande ale
strintht' force and effect as Obefor and we the said Aldirman balyeis coun
sale and communite and Our' Successouris sale warand kep and defend' ale and
haile the said half nethis fisching' with the pertinence to the said Tho
mas his airis and assignez for ale the termes of aucht yeris as
said Is aganis aganis ale dedly ale fraude and gyle away put In
witnesing of the quhilkis our commone Seile Is hungyn' tile thir our lettres
at Abirdene the aucht day of may the yer' of god a thousand four'
hundretht nynty and Sevyn' yeris be for thir witnesis ser Johne Ruthirfurd'
Aldirman Alexander menyes Robert blinselle Dauid menyes Alexander red Johne
of Cullane Johne collison' Thomas prat Johne Wormet burges' of
the said burghe and ser Johne stirueling public notar et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxixo
die mensis maij quo Supra

The saide day Alexander prat cristy prat Androw lousone Robert flessar'
Jonhne flessar Robert futhes Williame blytht eldar Kelour lammyntone
William Cardnow and the saide Cristy for the saide Androw lousone oblist
thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis that euere tua of thame sal fynd'
mak and vphald' ane Candile to worschip the Sacrament one corpus
cristis day in tymes to Cum for the plesouris of the tone and for the amendis
and assithtment of the Inobedience and falt committit agan the common' ordinance
of the tone In the falyeing of the bering and vphalding of the said candillis

Eodem die Johannes Duncansone amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore
J Dauid mathesone prelocutoris assise pro iniusto Impedimento p
habiturum passagium a domo siue porta sua et ad emendandum
ut Jura volunt

The saide day It was fundin ande deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Dauid' mathesone forspekar that medy heruy is avand' to Androw
michelsone xxiiij s' Scottis money quhilkis the ballies chargit hir'
to pay within terme of law

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis patrik
leslie forspekar that Jonhne blak sal preiwe one friday that next cumis
that he has pait the maile of the hous' pertening to the ayr' of Richard'
Craufurd' safar' as he occupeit the Samyn befor the balyes and falyeing
tharof he sal pay the said' maile

vltimo die maij quo supra Consules et communitas huius burgi Corpus
representan' Elegerunt dominum Johannem ruthirfurd prepositum thomam leslie
et Robertum Cullane duos ballivorum coniunctim et divisim suos commissarios ac
procuratores cum potestate substituendum sub se vnum et plures in defensione cuiusdam pretense
summonicionis regie fact' super totum burgum responsurus ad Instanciam Suppremj domini
nostri Regis et patricij gordone Insuper concesserunt et ordinarunt ad expensum
prepositj et vnius balliuorum secum accessur' pro expedicione huiusmodi negocij in
quolibet die decim solidos Et xx s' balliuo ad ex' ordinaria congregata
perre premunicionj preconis communis per totum burgum Circumuentis

The saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and communite warnit be
the hand'bell present for the tyme representand' the body of the tone
grantit and affermit the akis and writis of assedacionis maid' vndir
thar commone Sele of tua nethis of the furdis to Alexander gray thomas
chapman george bysset and Androw Crag of the saide fischingis And'
deliuerit to the saide thomas his letter of tak Ande the said thomas
pait Sextene markis one the common' kyst to the aldirman at the
tovnis commavnd'

The saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and Communite present for
the tyme grantit to pay to Alexander rede v s' for the kingis letter sex
schillingis and aucht d' for the decret optenit apone mastir Androw
Cadiow and tene s' for the wyne proponit to the lordis for the sollista
cione of the said matir

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die maij quo
Supra

The saide day hew gray was in ane Amerciament of the Court be ane suorne
assis' Dauid menyeis forspekar for the strubulance of Androw maluyn
and to amend' as law will and forber' in tym to Cum

The saide day patrik leslie come law borghe' be his hande that Dauid
gourlay Androw maluyn and Jonhne maluyn salbe skathles for hew gray and his
partj bot as law will And' William Wormet come law borghe'
that the saide hew gray and his partj salbe skathles for the saidez Dauid
Androw and Jonhne bot as law will

The saide day patrik leslie Come Souerte tile Entir Archebald'
man tile hew gray to morne In lauchfull Court tyme of day
within this tolbutht befor the aldirman and balyeis tile vndirlie the
law anent the strubulance done be him one Jonhne maluyn et cetera
